lead_paragraph: A Spanish state prosecutor on Friday asked a judge to open an investigation into alleged tax evasion by former Spain midfielder Xabi Alonso.

headline.print_headline: Spanish Judge Asked to Open Tax Case Into Xabi Alonso
headline.main: Spanish Judge Asked to Open Tax Case Into Xabi Alonso

snippet: A Spanish state prosecutor on Friday asked a judge to open an investigation into alleged tax evasion by former Spain midfielder Xabi Alonso....
